name: PaperFoam bv
goal:
PaperFoam bv develops and produces biobased packaging material, resulting in packaging with a very low carbon footprint.
PaperFoam is used for packaging of electronics, cosmetics, media, medical products and food.
PaperFoam aims towards a sustainable society where conventional packaging is replaced by sustainable PaperFoam packaging, thus reducing the carbon footprint of organizations drastically.
interests: Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Research and Technology
